data.name: Cybersecurity Analyst (Intern)
data.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
content: Worked with the wider security team on network monitoring and vulnerability assessment.
Monitored network traffic and identified security vulnerabilities.
Implemented security measures to protect critical systems and infrastructure.

data.name: Penetration Tester (Intern)
data.title: Penetration Tester
content: Collaborated with the development team on security testing initiatives.
Participated in intrusion testing and vulnerability assessments.
Gained exposure to web design/content and SEO/branding tasks.

data.name: DevOps/Security Intern
data.title: DevOps & Security Intern
content: Contributed to payment systems security and infrastructure.
Worked on automation and system administration tasks.
Gained hands-on experience with modern DevOps practices.
